name: PlaySound
description: Plays a sound when a message matches the regex for capcode or alias

config.name: regexPattern
config.label: Capcode/Alias Regex
config.description: Enter a regex to match capcodes or aliases you want to trigger a sound for

config.name: soundURL
config.label: Sound URL
config.description: Enter the URL of the sound file to play (MP3 format recommended)

config.name: playForAll
config.label: Play sound for all messages
config.description: If checked, the sound will play for every message received
